text: Cedric's Barber Battle is an American reality television series that aired on The CW. The show premiered on Friday, April 17, 2015, at 8:00 pm EDT and aired there for three episodes. The show returned on Monday, June 29, 2015, at 9:30 pm EDT.Cedric's Barber Battle Video - Hollywood | Watch Online Free It is a barber competition series hosted by Cedric the Entertainer. The first season consists of 10 episodes, however, only 8 aired. On August 23, 2016, The CW cancelled Cedric's Barber Battle after one season. ==Episodes== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:70%;" |- ! style="background:#A69725; color:#fff;"| No. ! style="background:#A69725; color:#fff;"| Title ! style="background:#A69725; color:#fff;"| Original air date ! style="background:#A69725; color:#fff;"| U.S. viewers (millions) |- |} == References == Category:2010s American reality television series Category:2015 American television series debuts Category:English- language television shows Category:The CW original programming
